markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Tectonic Stomp](/Feats.aspx?ID=3787) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 10, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 101</row>

</column>

---

You cause minor tremors that topple your enemies. All creatures in a 30-foot emanation who are standing on the ground take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 2 levels you have, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. A creature that fails its save also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
name: Tectonic Stomp

All creatures in a 30-foot emanation who are standing on the ground take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 2 levels you have, with a basic Reflex save. A creature that fails its save also falls prone.
